      • dropTempView

        public void dropTempView(String viewName)
        Drops the temporary view with the given view name in the catalog. If the view has been cached/persisted before, it's also unpersisted.

        Specified by:
        dropTempView in class Catalog
        Parameters:
        viewName - the name of the view to be dropped.
        Since:
